languages.text: "Ториана, время, которое можно было посвятить молчанию, закончилось. Сейчас речь идет о будущем торговой династии фон Валанциус и будущем вашего семейства тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Ториана, время, которое можно было посвятить молчанию, закончилось. Сейчас речь идет о будущем торговой династии фон Воланциус и будущем вашего семейства тоже".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."
languages.original_text: "Ториана, время, которое можно было посвятить молчанию, закончилось. Сейчас речь идет о будущем торговой династии фон Валанциус и будущем вашего семейства тоже".

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. Now it is both the future of the von Valancius trading dynasty and your House that are at stake here."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. Now it is both the future of the von Valancius trading dynasty and your House that are at stake here."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. Now it is both the future of the von Valancius trading dynasty and your House that are at stake here."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. Now it is both the future of the von Valancius trading dynasty and your House that are at stake here."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「トリアーナ、もう黙っている場合ではありません。フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝とギャプラック家、双方の未来が危機に瀕しているのです」
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: 「トリアーナ、もう黙っている場合ではありません。フォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝とギャプラック家、双方の未来が危機に瀕しているのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “托丽安娜，这种时候保持沉默无济于事。冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝与你的家族都命悬此刻。”
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: “托丽安娜，这种时候保持沉默无济于事。冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝与贾帕克家族的未来都命悬此刻。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Toriana, garder le silence ne servira à rien. Plus maintenant. Ce n'est pas seulement l'avenir de la dynastie commerciale von Valancius qui est en jeu, mais également celui de votre maison. »
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: « Toriana, garder le silence ne servira à rien. Plus maintenant. Ce n'est pas seulement l'avenir de la dynastie commerciale von Valancius qui est en jeu, mais également celui de votre maison. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Toriana, el momento de guardar silencio ha pasado. El futuro de la dinastía comercial von Valancius y el de su casa están en juego».
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: «Toriana, el momento de guardar silencio ha pasado. Tanto el futuro de la dinastía comercial von Valancius como el de su casa están en juego».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Toriana, die Zeit des Schweigens ist längst vorbei. Nun stehen sowohl die Zukunft der Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius als auch die Eures Hauses auf dem Spiel."
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, die Zeit des Schweigens ist längst vorbei. Nun steht sowohl die Zukunft der Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius als auch Eures Hauses auf dem Spiel."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Toriana, sessiz kalınacak vakitleri geçtik. İşin ucunda von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının ve hanenizin istikbali var."
languages.original_text: "Toriana, the time to keep silent is long gone. The future of the von Valancius trade dynasty and your house are both at stake now."

traits.locale_text: "Toriana, sessiz kalınacak vakit çoktan geçti. İşin ucunda von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığının ve hanenizin istikbali var."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
